Description: A one-stop solution through which various services starting from student application, application receipt, processing, sanction and disbursal of various scholarships to students are enabled.
Target Audience: Students pursuing higher education, economically weaker sections

Description: DIKSHA (Digital Infrastructure for Knowledge Sharing) is a national platform for teachers, students and parents to engage in learning content relevant to the prescribed school curriculum.

e-Pathshala is a joint initiative of Ministry of Education, Govt. of India and NCERT to disseminate all educational e-resources including textbooks, audio, video, periodicals, and a variety of other digital resources.

SWAYAM (Study Webs of Active-learning for Young Aspiring Minds) is an Indian MOOCs platform offering free online courses for school, undergraduate, postgraduate, engineering, law and other professional courses.
NCS is a one-stop solution that provides a wide array of employment and career-related services to the citizens of India. It works towards bridging the gap between job seekers and employers.
Focus Area: Job Search, Career Counseling, Skill Matching
Target Audience: Job seekers, students, employers, career counselors
